strings.value: Salom Aziza! Bu sizning yangi krossovkalaringizmi?

context.speaker: Dilnoza
context.en_line: Hi Aziza! Are these your new trainers?

strings.value: Ha, ular! Men ularni kecha sotib oldim.

context.speaker: Aziza
context.en_line: Yes, they are! I bought them yesterday.

strings.value: Ular juda chiroyli! Menga sizning krossovkalaringiz yoqadi.

context.speaker: Dilnoza
context.en_line: They're very nice! I like your trainers.

context.speaker: Aziza
context.en_line: Thanks! What about this jumper? Do you like it?

strings.value: Ha, men bu jemperni yaxshi ko'raman! U yangimi?

context.speaker: Dilnoza
context.en_line: Yes, I love that jumper! Is it new?

strings.value: Ha, men bu jemperni o'tgan hafta sotib oldim.

context.speaker: Aziza
context.en_line: Yes, I bought this jumper last week.

strings.value: Va bu paypoqlar? Bular ham siznikimi?

context.speaker: Dilnoza
context.en_line: And these socks? Are these yours too?

strings.value: Yo'q, bular mening paypoqlarim emas. Ular mening ukamniki.

context.speaker: Aziza
context.en_line: No, these aren't my socks. They're my brother's.

context.speaker: Dilnoza
context.en_line: Look at this scarf! It's beautiful!

strings.value: Ha, lekin menga bu rang yoqmaydi. Men ko'k rangni yaxshi ko'raman.

context.speaker: Aziza
context.en_line: Yes, but I don't like that color. I like blue.

context.speaker: Jasur
context.en_line: Farrukh, are these your new boots?

context.speaker: Farrukh
context.en_line: Yes, they are! The boots are leather.

strings.value: Charm etiklar juda yaxshi! Va bu sumka? Bu siznikimi?

context.speaker: Jasur
context.en_line: Leather boots are very good! And this bag? Is this yours?

strings.value: Yo'q, bu meniki emas. U sumka meniki.

context.speaker: Farrukh
context.en_line: No, this isn't mine. That bag is mine.

context.speaker: Jasur
context.en_line: Is your bag leather too?

strings.value: Yo'q, unday emas. Mening sumkam plastmassadan.

context.speaker: Farrukh
context.en_line: No, it isn't. My bag is plastic.

context.speaker: Jasur
context.en_line: What about these gloves? Are they yours?

strings.value: Ha, bu qo'lqoplar meniki. Ular paxtadan.

context.speaker: Farrukh
context.en_line: Yes, these gloves are mine. They're cotton.

context.speaker: Jasur
context.en_line: Cotton gloves are warm!

strings.value: Ha, men ularni har sovuq kunda kiyaman.

context.speaker: Farrukh
context.en_line: Yes, I wear them every cold day.

context.speaker: Kamola
context.en_line: Sardor, whose scarf is this?

strings.value: Menimcha, bu meniki. Ha, bu sharf meniki.

context.speaker: Sardor
context.en_line: I think it's mine. Yes, this scarf is mine.

strings.value: Va u kostyum kimniki? U siznikimi?

context.speaker: Kamola
context.en_line: And whose suit is that? Is it yours?

strings.value: Yo'q, bu meniki emas. U kostyum bizning otamizniki.

context.speaker: Sardor
context.en_line: No, it isn't mine. That suit is our father's.

context.speaker: Kamola
context.en_line: Look! Whose trainers are these?

context.speaker: Sardor
context.en_line: These aren't mine. Are they yours?

strings.value: Yo'q, ular meniki emas. Menimcha ular bizning onamizniki.

context.speaker: Kamola
context.en_line: No, they aren't mine. I think they're our mother's.

context.speaker: Sardor
context.en_line: What about this jumper in the bedroom?

strings.value: Bu bizniki emas. Menimcha u uniki.

context.speaker: Kamola
context.en_line: That isn't ours. I think it's his.

strings.value: Ha, bu kiyimlar uniki. Ularning hammasi uning shkafida.

context.speaker: Sardor
context.en_line: Yes, these clothes are his. They're all in his wardrobe.

strings.value: Siz rasmiylashtirilgan sport poyabzali kiymaysizmi? Faqat tuflimi?
Yo'q, men tufli emas. Men krossovka kiyaman.
Xato. 'Trainers' = sport poyabzali, rasmiy tufli emas.
Ingliz tilida ayting: 'Bu sizning yangi krossovkalaringizmi?'
Siz sovuq kunlarda faqat ko'ylak kiymaysizmi? Issiq narsa yo'qmi?
Yo'q, men issiq narsa ham kiyaman. Men jemper kiyaman.
Xato. 'Jumper' = issiq kiyim, suzish kiyimi emas.
Siz poyabzalingizda hech narsa kiymaysizmi? Yalang oyoqmi?
Yo'q, men yalang oyoq emas. Men paypoq kiyaman.
Xato. 'Socks' = oyoqlar uchun, qo'llar uchun emas.
Va bu paypoqlar? Bular ham siznikimi?
Siz sovuq kunlarda bo'yningizga hech narsa o'ramaysizmi?
Yo'q, men nimadir o'rayman. Men sharf o'rayman.
Xato. 'Scarf' = bo'yin uchun (lekin ba'zida boshda ham).
Ha, bu mening kitobim emas. Bu sizning kitobingiz.
Xato. 'Yours' = mustaqil so'z (ot yo'q): 'Is this yours?'
⚠️ Ot yo'q bo'lsa 'YOURS' kerak ('your' + ot yo'q ❌)!
Siz qishda ham yengil krossovka kiymaysizmi? Baland oy poyabzal kerak emasmi?
Yo'q, men qishda krossovka emas. Men etik kiyaman.
Ingliz tilida ayting: 'Bu sizning yangi etiklaringizmi?'
Yo'q, ular plastmassa emas. Ular charmdan.
Siz narsalaringizni qo'lingizda ushlab yurmasizmi? Cho'ntagingizda saqlamaysizmi?
Yo'q, men sumkada saqlayman. Men sumka ishlataman.
Yo'q, bu do'stimniki emas. Bu meniki.
Xato. 'Mine' = mustaqil so'z: 'This is mine' (ot yo'q).
Yo'q, bu meniki emas. U sumka meniki.
⚠️ Ot yo'q bo'lsa 'MINE' kerak ('my' + ot yo'q ❌)!
Yo'q, u charm emas. U plastmassadan.
Yo'q, unday emas. Mening sumkam plastmassadan.
Siz sovuq kunlarda qo'llaringizga hech narsa kiymaysizmi?
Yo'q, men nimadir kiyaman. Men qo'lqop kiyaman.
Xato. 'Gloves' = qo'llar uchun, oyoqlar uchun emas.
Yo'q, u plastmassa emas. U paxtadan.
Ha, bu qo'lqoplar meniki. Ular paxtadan.
Siz mening narsalarimni ko'rdingiz. Lekin kimniki ekanini bilmaysizmi?
Siz muhim uchrashuvga jeans va futbolka kiymaysizmi?
Yo'q, men jeans emas. Men kostyum kiyaman.
Va u kostyum kimniki? U siznikimi?
Yo'q, bu sizniki yoki meniki emas. Bu uniki.
Bu bizniki emas. Menimcha u uniki.
⚠️ Egalik uchun 'HIS' kerak ('him' emas - u object pronoun)!
Bu xona sizning do'stingiznikimi? Boshqa odamnikimi?
Yo'q, bu boshqa odamniki emas. Bu bizniki.
⚠️ Ot yo'q bo'lsa 'OURS' kerak ('our' + ot yo'q ❌)!
Siz do'koningа faqat poyabzal sotib olasizmi? Boshqa narsa yo'qmi?
Yo'q, men boshqa narsa ham sotib olaman. Men kiyim sotib olaman.
Xato. 'Clothes' = barcha kiyimlar, faqat poyabzal emas.
Ha, bu kiyimlar uniki. Ularning hammasi uning shkafida.
Men kecha yangi kiyim sotib oldim.
